dict.string: if [[ ! -f "$TM_NEW_FILE" ]]; then sed -e "/\${TM_LANGUAGE}/s//`tr <<<${TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME} '[A-Z]' '[a-z]'`/" \ -e "/\${TM_BASENAME}/s//${TM_NEW_FILE_BASENAME}/" \ -e "/\${TM_USERNAME}/s//`niutil -readprop / /users/\$USER realname`/" \ -e "/\${TM_UUID}/s//`uuidgen|tr -d '\n'`/" \ Template.plist >"$TM_NEW_FILE" fi
